ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So she conceived him and withdrew with him to a distant place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When she conceived him she went away to a distant place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then she conceived him and withdrew with him to a far-off place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: She conceived the child and retreated with him to a distant and solitary place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So she conceived him, and she went away with him to a far place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a remote place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So she conceived him; then withdrew herself with him to a remote place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So she conceived him, and withdrew with him to a distant place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a far place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So she conceived him and withdrew with him to a distant place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: hen she conceived him, and she retired with him to a place far-off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thus she conceived him, then withdrew with him to a distant place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So she conceived him, and she retired with him to a remote place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a far place (i.e. Bethlehem valley about 4-6 miles from Jerusalem).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Thereupon she carried him, and retired to a far off place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So she carried him, and secluded herself with him in a remote place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a remote place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:22] Thus she conceived him and then withdrew, retreated, with him to a distant place, far from her family.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And she, conceived him) she bore him for nine months; and it is also said: her pregnancy lasted one day, (and she withdrew with him) i.e. to deliver him (to a place) far away from people.
